front.title: Generic Policy Data Model for Simplified Use of Policy Abstractions (SUPA)

abstract.t: This document defines two YANG policy data modules. The first is a generic policy model that is meant to be extended on an application- specific basis. The second is an exemplary extension of the first generic policy model, and defines rules as event-condition-action policies. Both models are independent of the level of abstraction of the content and meaning of a policy.
